headline: Mike Lindell’s Interview with RSBN’s Brian Glenn at Kari Lake Campaign Event in Morristown, AZ
author: Grace Saldana
sentences: As a media personality and political activist, I am completely dedicated to working to preserve American values and put America First when everything in our culture tries to destroy the ideals that make our country great.
In my spare time, I enjoy learning about history and working on my blog The Republican Girl which serves to inform and empower young conservative women who are passionate about politics.
Soon after that, I founded a club on campus that grew to 200+ students, interviewed on national television, and started writing news professionally.
I carried this passion for freedom with me into college, where I joined conservative college activism group Turning Point USA.
I’m currently pursuing a bachelor’s degree in Government at Liberty University.
I'm Grace Saldana, Editor-in-Chief at Right Side Broadcasting Network.
